messages.content: I'm starting my deep dive into Green's functions for PDEs on 2025-03-01, and I'm trying to understand the definition of Green's functions as solutions to L[G] = δ(x-ξ) for operator L = d²/dx², can you help me solve the equation d²G/dx² = δ(x-ξ) for G, where δ(x-ξ) is the Dirac delta function? ->-> 1,1
